<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Mammoth Speaker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=110)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Saga Lands

</column>

You have learned the secrets of taming the mighty mammoths and other megafauna of the far north. Perhaps these talents are a part of your people’s traditional customs, or perhaps you sought out these massive animals of your own accord.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Animal Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) skill feat.
